Upstream footprint and downstream effects matrices

Source: R/embodied.R
calc_F_footprint_effects.Rd

Calculates upstream footprint matrices (F_footprint_p, F_footprint_s) and downstream effects matrices (F_effects_p, F_effects_s) given an embodied matries M_p and M_s. Column sums of F_footprint are 1. Row sums of F_effects are 1.

calc_F_footprint_effects(.Mdata = NULL, M_p_colname = "M_p",
  M_s_colname = "M_s", F_footprint_p_colname = "F_footprint_p",
  F_effects_p_colname = "F_effects_p",
  F_footprint_s_colname = "F_footprint_s",
  F_effects_s_colname = "F_effects_s")

Arguments

.Mdata

a data frame containing a column of embodied matrices
M_p_colname

the name of the column in .Mdata containing embodied product matrices (default is "M_p")
M_s_colname

the name of the column in .Mdata containing embodied sector matrices (default is "M_s")
F_footprint_p_colname

the name of the column in the output containing F_footprint_p matrices (as a string)
F_effects_p_colname

the name of the column in the output containing F_effects_p matrices (as a string)
F_footprint_s_colname

the name of the column in the output containing F_footprint_s matrices (as a string)
F_effects_s_colname

the name of the column in the output containing F_effects_s matrices (as a string)

Value

.Mdata with columns F_footprint_p, F_effects_p, F_footprint_s, and F_effects_s added

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
